member.name: IInitializeWithFile.Initialize
member.summary: Initializes a handler with a file path.
member.param: A pointer to a buffer that contains the file path as a null-terminated Unicode string.

param.name: grfMode
param.para: One of the following STGM values that indicates the access mode for pszFilePath.
The file indicated by IInitializeWithFile.Initialize is read-only.
The file indicated by IInitializeWithFile.Initialize can be read from and written to.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IInitializeWithFile
member.summary: Exposes a method to initialize a handler, such as a property handler, thumbnail handler, or preview handler, with a file path.
